messages:
Name: Ivo Grbic
Nationality: Croatia
Date of Birth: January 18, 1996
Position: Goalkeeper
Current club: Sheffield United
Championship clubs played for: Sheffield United
Sheffield United goalkeeper Ivo Grbic is yet to make his first Championship appearance after joining the club on January 26, 2024.
Next up in the league for Sheffield United is a trip to Hull City on September 13.
Last season for Sheffield United, Grbic made nine Premier League appearances.
Grbic linked up with Sheffield United in January 2024 from Atlético Madrid, for whom he made 12 league appearances in total.
